channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: House waste dumped on pavement, 10th June
item.description:
Contents of Flat No 335D Amhurst Road, Hackney N16 7UX. Contents appears to belong to resident Ms Astaire Baysal has been dumped on the pavement, on the across opposite side of the street.
Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Amhurst Road, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Abandon car, 10th June
item.description:

item.title: Flytipped rubbish bags and broken wheelie bin, 10th June
item.description:
There is a broken wheelie bin without a lid, and a large number of black rubbish bags have been flytipped. This is a frequent flytipping location, so it would be great to address this promptly and have the wheelie bin replaced so it does not continue to attract dog poo bags and more fly tipping. Thank you!

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 1, Wingfield Street, London
Report on FixMyStreet
